```{r setup}
library(tidyverse)
```


## pivot_longer

Load the PULSE data

```{r}
pulse_data =
  haven::read_sas("./data/data_import_examples/public_pulse_data.sas7bdat") %>% 
  janitor::clean_names()
```

Wide format to long format ...

```{r}
pulse_data_tidy =
  pulse_data %>% 
  pivot_longer(
    bdi_score_bl:bdi_score_12m, 
    names_to = "visit", 
    names_prefix = "bdi_score_",
    values_to = "bdi"
  )
```
rewrite, combine, and extend (to add a mutate)

```{r}
pulse_data =
  haven::read_sas("./data/data_import_examples/public_pulse_data.sas7bdat") %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
    pivot_longer(
    bdi_score_bl:bdi_score_12m, 
    names_to = "visit", 
    names_prefix = "bdi_score_",
    values_to = "bdi"
  ) %>% 
  relocate(id, visit) %>% 
  mutate(visit = recode (visit, "bl" = "00m"))
```
